name: 2player game
description:
player 1 movement

A-move left

D-move right

W-jump

Or you can use a xbox 360 remote and use directional to move

player 2 movement

Use directional arrows on keboard to move

Use mouse to position cursor to the direction you want to shoot

click anywhere with mouse to fire

Objective

player one must survive 30 seconds without dying

player 2 must eliminate player one before timer runs out
